parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the cluster. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID. You can specify multiple cluster IDs. Valid values of N: 1 to 50.

> You must specify at least one of the following parameters: ResourceId.N and Tag.N.Key.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **cluster**.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that are added to clusters.
